response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are confident it would be a valuable addition to your endeavors. Considering its true worth, we propose an offer of $950,000 for this product. We believe this price reflects its immense value while providing you with a competitive advantage. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
